Key Match Events: Jared Jones yielded six earned runs across five innings, as the Pirates fell to the Reds 7-1.
Elly De La Cruz hit a three-run homer that traveled an estimated 423 feet.
Billy Cook hit a solo home run in the top of the ninth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Jared Jones described his performance as 'terrible.'
Manager Derek Shelton commented on Jones' inconsistency and the impact of his injury.
Shelton emphasized the importance of finishing strong for their pitchers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Bednar tossed a scoreless seventh inning.
Ryan Borucki blanked the Reds in the eighth inning.
Jalen Beeks gave up the Reds' seventh and final run in the sixth inning.
Rhett Lowder pitched five scoreless innings for the Reds.
Bryan Reynolds is tied with Brendan Donovan for the most hits (14) against the Reds this year.
